venue.name: Boston Affilaite Marketing Networking Group @ iBasis in Burlington, MA

item.description:
The 3rd Boston Affiliate Marketing Networking Roundtable Meetup

----- Local Boston Affiliates & Affiliate Marketing Managers Wanted! ------

A new spin off to our SEO group to help those that want to meet up during the day to focus on affiliate marketing topics.


The Boston Affiliate Marketing Roundtable is a group of Boston affiliate managers and affiliates that meet in a monthly open round table discussion to share tips, strategies and develop long term partnership
with in the local Boston affiliate marketing community.

Still want to know whats it about? Read a review of our first meeting at at http://marksguide.com...


We usually meet the 3rd Thursday of the month at 2:30pm. This month will shoot for the 4rth Thursday


Location: Hosted at iBasis / Pingo.com in Burlington, MA with a fridge full of drinks and snacks provided.


Agenda:


2:30 to 3:00pm Affiliate Marketing Roundtable Discussion.

* Each attendee will be given a slot of time to share tips and find support from fellow members.

* The group also provides a monthly team check up of support to your monthly tasks and goals


3:00 to 3:15pm Guest affiliate website to be reviewed for tips

Robert Glazer
Founder
http://www.bobbysbest...


3:15 to 3:45pm

Did You Hear? CJ is Coming....CJ is Coming....CJ is Coming....

Scott Ginsberg
Senior Account Manager
Commission Junction

* Review whats new & tips to using CJ.


3:45 to 4pm

Last Min.....Guest Speaker!

Chitika, Inc
www.chitika.com

We should have the CEO of Chitika to present about the company with additional ways to monitize your affiliate website.


This Month Tasks & Topics:

Ecomxpo http://ecomxpo.com/ho...
We understand some of you may need to be online to manage your virtual booth. That's fine but lets discuss and share tips to affiliate industry trade shows to online networkings sites like http://www.bumpzee.co...

* Affiliate Incentives That Really Work

4:30pm Flexible one on one time to set up individual networking opportunities with Am's to Affiliates or head home.


Some attendees may want to arrange one on ones to meet up for lunch prior or coffee after or just go shopping at the Burlington Mall!


Contact Group organization

Brian Hawkins
Affilaite Marketing Manager
http://www.Pingo.com...
http://www.SuperAffil...
bhawkins /at/ pingo.com
781-505-7865


Go No Wheels? Carpool service can be arranged to be picked up and returned to alewife station. And don't worry, will get you all out before traffic piles up on 95, so that you can get home early as an extra perk for attending.
